skills.name: Enchantment of Herbs
skills.description: [SP: 20][CD: 20s] Generates a global aura that affects all enemies. Impairs target enemy (does not work on bosses), reducing its ATK by 46%. Immobilizes all other enemies besides target and inflicts Time Freeze. All other enemies except for the target cannot be targeted and take greatly reduced DMG. This aura lasts for 7.60s.

skills.name: Suppression
skills.description: Attacks against weakened enemies gain 30% Total DMG Multiplier.
